subject: re:Can't find good drug store
body:
Dear customer.
Wanna save on the medications you buy on the Internet but afraid that it might be dangerous for your health? It won't be with our discount Canadian pharmacy.
At CanadianPharmacy you will always be able to find the generic drugs you need and they will be a lot cheaper that those sold in the USA. CanadianPharmacy is a licensed Canadian e-shop, which lets it (and you too) turn the Canadian drug taxation system to its advantage.
Learn to save on medications without having to risk your health shop at CanadianPharmacy.
Yours faithfully,Spielas Winters
